select.description: Select type of data to be considered in the analysis

help.desc: Filter the sequences according to a length cut-off
Filter the sequences according to a frequency cut-off
Filter the sequences mapping onto a specific locus, for instance "let" in the textbox indicates that only the sequences annotated in the let family of miRNAs are considered in the analysis
Select all sequences mapped onto a specific database. If the textbox is empty all databases used for annotation will be considered in the analysis

Total frequency represents the total number of counts for the different sequences. Different locus represents the different annotated loci. MAX represents the maximal frequency of the parameter considered in the analysis (length or DB). MIN represents the minimal frequency of the parameter considered in the analysis (length or DB)
Selet a bars or a pie chart for the analysis output
